It's a real shame that CSGO stole a very good portion of the player base of this game, because it's honestly superior in just about every way except for graphics, and this is coming from someone who was super hyped for GO and was one of the first to get into the beta. 

Far better mouse controls
No stupid, arbitrary, unrealistic spray patters
No unrealistic garbage like being able to aim perfectly with a scout while jumping
Far more satisfying kills
Far better modded game modes 
FAR better surround sound
Mostly better map design
More customizable reticle
More satisfying weapons
Better time to kill that more accurately reflects a player's skill
A better community (usually)
No stupid microtransactions

And most of all, it was way more fun.

I'll forever miss the fun I had with this game now that it's pretty much dead in North America. CSGO just doesn't satisfy the style of gameplay I was looking for in a Counter-Strike game. Maybe that's just me and my stupid standards, considering virtually every tween on the Internet thinks it's the best game ever, but I just can't find any reason to consider CSGO better than CSS in any catagory other than graphics. Maybe if Valve had more control over development than Hidden Path Entertainment it could have turned out differently, but there's no use in speculating what could have been.


R.I.P CSS. Hopefully if there is another Counter-Strike released, it returns more to the format of 1.6 and/or CSS.

steam上起源玩的不多，但是以前玩盗版真的是初中玩到大学伴随我走过了CF，魔兽，Dota，lol众多游戏。此生最遗憾起源不火，作为Source引擎CS正统续作非常优秀，即使是04年的画质现在看来也是能够接受，游戏性不输其他FPS（CSGO专家电脑不及起源困难电脑），最成功的莫过于起源上的众多分支玩法和Mod，着实为起源续命不少。
虽然起源游戏生命周期已过，但是作为单机游戏玩和玩Mod仍然值得而且不贵，推荐指数五颗星我给86/100分

For people who enjoy a fast stretegic shooter and for the people who like to lay back and play a chill game, this is the game for everyone.

I have been playing Counter-Strike for years, and I can say that I am terrible at the game. However, it all boils down to the wonderful comunity developed to this game. There are thousands of community made servers for fun and for real play. In a nutshell, the game isn't flawless, but the mods keep it active. 

I recomend it if you:
-Played Quake or Unreal
-Played any Valve game
-Shooter fan

LE meilleur FPS qui soit:

Simple et efficace, un jeu ouvert au "mod".
La communauté permet d'étendre la durée de vie à l'infinie.
Des milliers de maps, des dizaines et dizaines de mode joués et testés, sans jamais se lasser.

Avec des amis, une team ou même tout seul, ce jeu pulvérise encore ce qui sort aujourd'hui. ( Je parle des AAA aussi beau graphiquement qu'a la ramasse niveau gameplay, sans parler des prix...)

Un jeu qui doit faire partit de votre bibliothèque si vous aimez les FPS purs et durs.
